requirements: The system must support the measurement data process.
The system must handle the transition between different operating models (e.g., 1.0 model and 2.0 model).
The system must be able to invoice for less than a day.
The system must support the generation of zero values for invoicing.
The system must support the delivery of measurement data.
The system must handle the delivery of missing values to the seller.
The system must support the final operating model by the end of 2024.
The system must be reliable and able to handle various operational scenarios.
The system must be scalable to support future growth and changes.
The system must be user-friendly for end users and system suppliers.
The system must be able to manage the transition period effectively.
The system must be flexible to accommodate different industry requirements.
The system must comply with legal and regulatory requirements.
The system must be compatible with existing systems and infrastructure.
The system must be able to handle data from various sources.
The system must be able to integrate with other systems and platforms.
The system must be able to handle large volumes of data efficiently.
The system must be secure and protect sensitive data.
